page.title: 08Home Life
page.content: Families in our area seem to be close knit, with a high proportion having more than one{relation}in the area. Time was spent regularly visiting other members of the{family.}A great deal of{television}is watched by the whole family, around five hours for children and seven hours for adults per day being quite normal. Most families have{pets.}These and hobbies took up much of the children's sspare time. Most families interviewed had the usual{labour saving devices}such s automatic washers, vacuum cleaners etc., and most had a car. Many of the families interviewed in the area had a{mother working}but few thought this caused problems. Being a part of a family and being loved by them was seen as being most important.
